thread.title: Manchester United transfer news: Ligue 1 ace admits he'd love to join Red Devils | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news: Ligue 1 ace admits he'd love to join Red Devils | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United transfer news: Ligue 1 ace admits he'd love to join Red Devils | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 5:15 pm Romain Hamouma would love to join Manchester United (Picture: Getty) 
St Etienne winger Romain Hamouma has admitted he would jump at the chance to sign for Manchester United . 
The Frenchman could feature against the Red Devils at Old Trafford on Thursday night when Jose Mourinho’s men take on the Ligue 1 side. Paul Pogba shows brotherly love after Florentin is forced off injured 
While Mourinho has stated that he’d rather not compete in the Europa League, the competition represents the Red Devils’ most likely route into next season’s Champions League. 
United are overwhelming favourites against their French opposition and Hamouma, 29, has admitted he dreams about signing for the Premier League giants. Mourinho’s side take on St Etienne in the first leg at Old Trafford on Thursday (Picture: Getty) 
‘I dreamed of going professional. That’s the hardest bit,’ Hamouma told L’Equipe. 
‘Then, like everyone else, I dreamed of playing at such a club [as Manchester United].
